title: Harvard UC Finance Audit Finds No Irregularities, Vindicates Accused Council Members | News - Harvard Crimson
content: Harvard UC Finance Audit Finds No Irregularities, Vindicates Accused Council Members | News  Harvard Crimson
description: An audit of the Undergraduate Council’s finances has “yet to find evidence of any financial irregularities,” according to the report released Thursday in an email from Undergraduate Council President Michael Y. Cheng ’22 and Vice President Emmett E. de Kanter ’24.
